page.title: 02Fitz Farm Offord Cluny
page.content: The farm house is about 400 years old. The farm and house were named after Miss{Fitz-patrick}who lived there a long time ago.Before she came the house was let to a school for farmers' sons.They learnt land surveying and to calculate acreages.Fitz farm now has 100 acres in our area.It is an{arable {farm}and it helps to support the riding school.It has two fields of grass for hay.The farmer begins{ {hay-making}in June.He has five fields of winter wheat,which he plants in the Autumn.He sprays the fields twice a year.He{combine-harvests}the wheat at the end of July or the beginning of August depending on the weather.He sells the grain and uses the straw for the horses.He owns all his machinery.
